record.id: phaseName="Active" and workflowName="Configuration Item" and tableName="device"
record.name: Active

autoTransition.atCondition: istatus in $L.file="Missing" or istatus in $L.file="Retired/Consumed" or istatus in $L.file="Return for Maintenance" or istatus in $L.file="Return to Supplier"
autoTransition.atCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">istatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Missing</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">istatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Retired/Consumed</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">istatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Return for Maintenance</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">istatus</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Return to Supplier</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
autoTransition.atCondDesc: ( Status in CurrentRecord = "Missing" OR Status in CurrentRecord = "Retired/Consumed" OR Status in CurrentRecord = "Return for Maintenance" OR Status in CurrentRecord = "Return to Supplier")

action.actionCondition: type in $L.file="computer" and not (same(is.down in $L.file, true)) and not (same($L.mode, "add"))
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Type">type</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">computer</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Is Down">is.down</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">add</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( Type in CurrentRecord = "computer" AND Is Down in CurrentRecord != true AND $L.mode != "add")

record.updateCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">add</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="authorization"><TableName>CurrentRecordAuth</TableName><FieldName caption="Admin">new</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection><collection logical="OR" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">add</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="authorization"><TableName>CurrentRecordAuth</TableName><FieldName caption="">update</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
record.updateCondDesc: (( $L.mode = "add" AND user has "New" authorization) OR ( $L.mode != "add" AND user has "Update" authorization))
